mapper.select: SELECT q.idKey , q.userIdKey , u.userId , q.title , q.content , q.createDate , q.answerDate , q.status FROM fp_qna as q LEFT JOIN fp_user as u ON q.userIdKey = u.idKey ORDER BY q.idKey DESC
